short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color changing clock based on current time converted to hex color codes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lighten up.

The Hex Clock for Chrome replaces your new tab with a 24hr clock and corresponding hex coded background. Seamlessly fading into the next colour every second.
